page.title: 19Health cont
page.content: My family go to the dentist on the Belmont Road and he is very good.My mum used to work for him before I was born.I have only one filling which is good if you are eleven years old. We go to him every six months for a check up as well, and when I have any loose teeth I also go to him as I dont like my mum or dad trying to pull them out.When you go in to his surgery you have to sit in a special chair which leans back so that he can see your teeth properly.He looks at them and says things about them to the nurse who writes them down.He has a drill which makes a high pitched noise and sprays out water.Sometimes if you are getting a filling he will give you an injection so that it doesnt hurt.I dont mind going to the dentist as my teeth are good.
